name: Talos Blog
description: The Record by Recorded Future gives you exclusive, behind-the-scenes access to leaders, policymakers, researchers, and the people in the shadows of the cyber underground. We break news and interview those that matter in the fast-changing field of cybersecurity.

name: Checkpoint Research
description: Check Point Software Technologies Ltd. (www.checkpoint.com) is a leading provider of cyber security solutions to governments and corporate enterprises globally. Its solutions protect customers from 5th generation cyber-attacks with an industry leading catch rate of malware, ransomware and other types of attacks. Check Point offers multilevel security architecture, “Infinity” Total Protection with Gen V advanced threat prevention, which defends enterprises’ cloud, network and mobile device held information. Check Point provides the most comprehensive and intuitive one point of control security management system. Check Point protects over 100,000 organizations of all sizes.

name: ZeroDayInitiative Advisories
description: Discovered security vulnerabilities which have been addressed by the affected vendor move from the upcoming advisories list to the published list in conjunction with a security advisory detailing the specifics of the bug. Subscribe to this feed to stay up to date on our latest released advisories.

name: FireEye
description: Information and insight on today's advanced threats from the leader in advanced threat prevention.

name: The Record
description: Cisco Talos Intelligence Group is one of the largest commercial threat intelligence teams in the world, comprised of world-class researchers, analysts and engineers.

name: RaidForums
description: RaidForums is a database sharing and marketplace forum. We have exclusive database breaches and leaks plus an active marketplace.

name: Recorded Future blog
description: Our aim is ambitious: to organize and analyze threat data in an entirely new and different way for better, faster security.

name: Vulsee
description: 关注前沿安全态势,聚合网络安全漏洞信息,分享安全文档案例 Pay attention to the cutting-edge security situation, aggregate network security vulnerability information, and share security document cases

name: Google Project Zero
description: Formed in 2014, Project Zero is a team of security researchers at Google who study zero-day vulnerabilities in the hardware and software systems that are depended upon by users around the world.

name: Bitdefender Labs
description: Bitdefender Labs discovers 400 new threats each minute and validates 30 billion threat queries daily.

name: Crowdstrike (Threat Research)
description: Reports from the threat research team at Crowdstrike.

name: EclecticIQ blog
description: EclecticIQ Fusion Center delivers thematic intelligence bundles, which provide you with a curated single source of relevant cyber threat intelligence.

name: Digital Shadows
description: The latest advice, opinion and research from our dedicated intelligence analyst team.

name: ExploitDB
description: The Exploit Database - Exploits, Shellcode, 0days, Remote Exploits, Local Exploits, Web Apps, Vulnerability Reports, Security Articles, Tutorials and more.

name: Microsoft Security Response Center
description: The Microsoft Security Response Center is part of the defender community and on the front line of security response evolution.

name: threat post
description: Threatpost is a long-running, independent source of news and analysis about the cybersecurity landscape, covering breaking news and threat research, malware and vulnerability analysis, long-term trends and everything in-between.

name: Security Magazine
description: Security magazine is the security industry’s go-to source for enterprise security trends, metrics, news and more!

name: Dark Reading
description: Long one of the most widely read cybersecurity online news sites, Dark Reading is also the most trusted online community for security professionals like you. Our community members include thought-leading security researchers, CISOs, and technology specialists, along with thousands of other security professionals.

name: Krebs on Security
description: Brian Krebs worked as a reporter for The Washington Post from 1995 to 2009, authoring more than 1,300 blog posts for the Security Fix blog, as well as hundreds of stories for washingtonpost.com and The Washington Post newspaper, including eight front-page stories in the dead-tree edition and a Post Magazine cover piece on botnet operators.

name: Schneier on Security
description: Bruce Schneier is an internationally renowned security technologist, called a 'security guru' by The Economist. He is the author of over one dozen books–including his latest, We Have Root–as well as hundreds of articles, essays, and academic papers.

name: Naked Security
description: Naked Security is Sophos’s award-winning threat news room, giving you news, opinion, advice and research on computer security issues and the latest internet threats.

name: ZDNet
description: ZDNet brings together the reach of global and the depth of local, delivering 24/7 news coverage and analysis on the trends, technologies, and opportunities that matter to IT professionals and decision makers.

name: CSO Online
description: CSO serves enterprise security decision-makers and users with the critical information they need to stay ahead of evolving threats and defend against criminal cyberattacks. With incisive content that addresses all security disciplines from risk management to network defense to fraud and data loss prevention, CSO offers unparalleled depth and insight to support key decisions and investments for IT security professionals.

name: Center for Internet Security
description: The Center for Internet Security, Inc. (CIS®) makes the connected world a safer place for people, businesses, and governments through our core competencies of collaboration and innovation.

name: Center for Internet Security
description: The Center for Internet Security, Inc. (CIS®) makes the connected world a safer place for people, businesses, and governments through our core competencies of collaboration and innovation.

name: CISCO
description: Cisco helps seize the opportunities of tomorrow by proving that amazing things can happen when you connect the unconnected. An integral part of our DNA is creating long-lasting customer partnerships, working together to identify our customers' needs and provide solutions that fuel their success.

name: CISCO
description: Cisco helps seize the opportunities of tomorrow by proving that amazing things can happen when you connect the unconnected. An integral part of our DNA is creating long-lasting customer partnerships, working together to identify our customers' needs and provide solutions that fuel their success.

name: SECURELIST by Kaspersky
description: Kaspersky is a global cybersecurity company founded in 1997. Kaspersky’s deep threat intelligence and security expertise is constantly transforming into innovative security solutions and services to protect businesses, critical infrastructure, governments and consumers around the globe.

name: CYBERSCOOP
description: CyberScoop is the leading media brand in the cybersecurity market. With more than 6.0M monthly unique engagements, CyberScoop reports on news and events impacting technology and security.

name: Heathcare IT News
description: Healthcare IT News is the industry’s authoritative source covering the people, policy and technology driving next-generation healthcare in the U.S. and throughout the world. Since 2003, it has been the voice of health IT, delivering editorial insights about compelling topics such as electronic health records, health information exchange, privacy and security, data analytics, patient engagement, population health and revenue cycle management.

name: Bleeping Computer
description: Bleeping Computer® is an information security and technology news publication created in 2004 by Lawrence Abrams. Millions of visitors come to BleepingComputer.com every month to learn about the latest security threats, technology news, ways to stay protected online, and how to use their computers more efficiently.

name: Bleeping Computer
description: Bleeping Computer® is an information security and technology news publication created in 2004 by Lawrence Abrams. Millions of visitors come to BleepingComputer.com every month to learn about the latest security threats, technology news, ways to stay protected online, and how to use their computers more efficiently.
